instructions: Open the official TikTok app on your Android or iOS device and tap on Me in the lower menu. Tap the ellipsis in the top-right corner. Tap Balance . Tap Recharge . Tap on the price next to the amount of TikTok coins that you wish to buy. If you have Apple Pay or Google Pay enabled on your smartphone, you ll be prompted to pay with it. If not, you ll be given the chance to pay with a credit card. Once the transaction has processed, you will be notified of a successful purchase within the app. Tap Okay . Your new balance of TikTok coins should now show within the app.
